algorithm_technique: Iterate through all 8 directions from the king. For each direction, scan outwards until a queen is found or the board edge is reached.
problem_summary_simple: Find black queens that can directly attack the white king on an 8x8 board.
problem_summary_technical: For each of the 8 directions from the king, find the first queen encountered in that line of sight.
key_insights: The chessboard is small (8x8), allowing for a constant time solution.
Queens attack along rows, columns, and diagonals.
A set is used for efficient O(1) lookup of queen positions.
